author: andschwa
body: We may need to remove the given launch configuration, as the location of the built `powershell` executable is no longer static. We could also use a task to save the location and load it into an environment variable.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: We now have to explicitly use the beta versions of both the C# extension, [1.0.3-rc2](https://github.com/OmniSharp/omnisharp-vscode/releases), the beta build of [VS Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/insiders), and switch to RC2 bits in #862 because now RC3 cannot be debugged.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Part of this is dependent on #913.

title: Fix VS Code debug setup
